name: handsoap - set
description: PLEASE VISIT OUR NEW SHOP TO PURCHASE HANDSOAP: WWW.IMAGINARYANIMAL.COM - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - Wash your hands with hands! Each hand is a (functional) work of art. Because these are handmade (by david & marie) each set is slightly different with different hand-shapes & skin-ish colors. + You will receive 8 hands of different shapes and colors. + The hands range from 3/4” to 2” tall. + Each hand is individually bagged. + Vegetable glycerin soap with a very light scent. + Packaged in a pretty green organza bag… All ready for gifting to a friend with dirty paws! Handsoap © 2008-present Marie Emily Gardeski Available to shops wholesale.

name: handsoap - pair - peach
description: PLEASE VISIT OUR NEW SHOP TO PURCHASE HANDSOAP: WWW.IMAGINARYANIMAL.COM - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - Here’s a pleasant pair. These are solid soap, good for washing with. The hands are each about 2 1/2” tall & weigh about 100 grams. The soap is natural vegetable glycerin & has a very light scent. This pair of plump palms will be packaged carefully in a nice little bag. Perfect for presents. Handmade by david & marie. Handsoap © 2008-present Marie Emily Gardeski Available to shops wholesale.
